q: Player for nearly 20 minutes, using his quickness to prevent Allen Iverson from even getting the ball, let alone shoot it. I just try to deny him the ball as much as possible, because when he does get the ball, the best penetrator in the game is going to be hard to stop, Tyronn Lue said.
